Title: A Shadow You Soon Will Be
Writer: Héctor Olivera, Osvaldo Soriano (novel), Osvaldo Soriano
Actors: Miguel Ángel Solá, Pepe Soriano, Martín Coria, Roberto Carnaghi
Plot: A computer programmer who, after his train breaks down, takes to wandering aimlessly through remote regions of La Pampa, Viedma and Carhue. he meets a succession of equally lost souls, including a globe-trotting gambler, a circus owner whose performers left him "because the whole country was a circus: and a tarot card reader with large gaps in her knowledge of the future.
